Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/29th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted SB: State, 29th, Michigan, 36th Pl and State, NB: State, 37th, Indiana, 35th and State: due to, street blockage near State/29th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/29th, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 29th, Michigan, 36th Place and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 37th, Indiana, 35th and State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Chase

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Clark, Touhy, Sheridan and Howard due to, street blockage near Clark/Chase.
